cont.entity_a: Awesome, with clear audio and no background noise. Great surround sound effect enhances movie watching and gaming experiences. Volume is adjustable and strong, with no static. Dolby Digital and Prologic sound is excellent, with perfect audio imaging.
cont.entity_b: Good noise isolation. Audio performance is outstanding with effective noise cancellation. Bass and treble are well-balanced, with no excessive bass. Sound is clear with good separation, better than some higher-priced models. Excellent sound reproduction for the price.

cont.entity_a: Well-constructed and comfortable, but the joint on each side of the headpiece is prone to snapping. Ear cushions could be softer. Headphones are larger but fit comfortably.
cont.entity_b: Durable, with soft cushions on the ear and top of headphones. Clamping force is strong, causing discomfort for prolonged use. Can cause headaches with extended wear.

cont.entity_a: Durable and long-lasting, with excellent sound quality even after years of use.
cont.entity_b: The right side speaker stopped working after a few months of use, indicating poor durability. Durability issues with components breaking after minimal use. Material of ear padding is prone to deterioration over time.

cont.entity_a: The headphones work off infrared sight, preventing radio interference but requiring line-of-sight to the transmitter. They have multiple input options including laser, left-right audio, and digital coax, and support Dolby and DTS stereo decoding. Easy to set up and use, with no interference or blocked signals.
cont.entity_b: Great for studio use with accurate sound representation. Good for blocking outside noise, but not for noise cancellation.

cont.entity_a: Expensive, but worth the investment if bought on sale below $150.
cont.entity_b: Excellent sound reproduction for the price.

cont.entity_a: Batteries provided do not hold charge after prolonged use, but can be replaced with new rechargeable ones. Replacement batteries are expensive and hard to find.
Lack of equalization options and no stand for the headphones.
cont.entity_b: Heavy coiled cord is awkward and uncomfortable to manage. Cord length and weight are problematic, affecting usability.

cont.entity_a: Good range, ideal for listening 10-15 feet away from the source.
